doc.title: Little League's Official How-to- Play Baseball Video
doc.plot: Little League's Official How-to-Play Baseball Video combines 70 minutes of entertaining and easy-to-understand instruction with network-style video effects in 19 comprehensive chapters. Basic enough for beginners, yet informative enough to help even the brightest young stars shine brighter. Produced by Little League for the 8-14 year players, the video teaches all the skills they'll need to excel at America's favorite pastime. There is a companion book that complements the video.
